results.title: ‘Black Panther: Wakanda Forever’ Review: Women on the Home Front

results.title: ‘The Fabelmans’ Review: Spielberg’s Own Sentimental Education
results.abstract: The director’s latest movie focuses on a budding filmmaker a lot like himself. But Michelle Williams, as his mother, is the soul of this fractious family drama.

results.title: Steven Spielberg Gets Personal
results.abstract: In making his autobiographical film “The Fabelmans,” he confronted some painful family secrets, as well as what it means to be Jewish in America today.

results.title: ‘Retrograde’ Review: The U.S. Withdrawal From Afghanistan
results.abstract: This documentary follows one Afghan general, Sami Sadat, to tell an emotional story.

results.title: Warren Beatty Is Accused of Sexually Assaulting a Minor in 1973
results.abstract: In a lawsuit filed this week, the plaintiff says Mr. Beatty groomed and coerced her into sex when she was 14 and 15. The actor, who had starred in “Bonnie and Clyde,” was about 35 at the time.

multimedia.caption: The plaintiff says Warren Beatty caused her “severe emotional, physical and psychological distress.”
